snippet.title: Glory Hunters Blastema extended, long and glorious trailer by 2think design studio.
snippet.description:
A massive object is about to strike Earth and you hear the call: Rise hunter.

Glory Hunters is an action adventure RPG with a unique and original twist: you progress through the game by obtaining achievements. Watch the extended trailer for a peek at Glory Hunters nostalgic gameplay, enemies, dungeons, and get ready to hunt for glory when Glory Hunters arrives in 2024 on PC and retro consoles.

Want to get a cartridge? Come and wishlist the game directly with BitmapSoft:
https://www.bitmapsoft.co.uk/product/glory-hunters/

Rather play it on PC? Wishlist right now in Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2297590/Glory_Hunters/

Want to play the Demo? Play it using any browser (even your cellphone!):
https://2think.itch.io/glory-hunters

Song: Blastema
Album: Glory Hunters Original Soundtrack
Music composed, orchestrated and conducted by Rodrigo Núñez

Love the music? Look out for the full album in Spotify and add some songs to your playlists to support the team!

https://open.spotify.com/intl-es/album/11YIaUrYSF9YE8rEcnqcxY?si=-3Zizd_ASzKtUdBjMfCfEw
